attributes.action: take immediate action to re-instate the small grant given to TRACKS (Autism) Stevenage, which is absolutely essential for its survival.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned being parents and supports of TRACKS (Autism) request the Prime Minister and the Secretary of State for Communities and Local Government take immediate action to re-instate the small grant given to TRACKS (Autism) Stevenage, which is absolutely essential for its survival.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "take immediate action to re-instate the small grant given to TRACKS (Autism) Stevenage, which is absolutely essential for its survival."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17259


Prime Minister's Office
